# role

**Instance Property**

The role of the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var role: UIButton.Role { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/Role-swift.enum] to define a button as the primary action or the cancel action in a view. Catalyst apps use this role to set the appearance and default key-binding of the buttons.

## Specifying the role

- **UIButton.Role**: Constants that describe the role of the button.
